Object.Name: muscleoxygensaturation
Object.Description1: This Resource describes the muscle oxygen saturation (SmO2), which is the percentage of hemoglobin that is saturated with oxygen in the capillaries of a muscle. The unit is percentage. The smo2 Property is a read-only value that is provided by the server.

Item.Name: muscleoxygensaturation
Item.Description: This Property describes the muscle oxygen saturation (SmO2), which is the percentage of hemoglobin that is saturated with oxygen in the capillaries of a muscle. The unit is percentage.
